reviews.text: They work exactly as expected, my kid loves them. And they're very easy to wash out of stuffed animals and clothing, as well as off of skin. They haven't dried out yet and are easy enough for my kid to open and close without help.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2025
reviews.title: Great quality and very washable

reviews.text: My two yer old daughter absolutely LOVES these markers instead versus the usual washable crayons she has been using every day for quite some time. They are a great gift value, quality, and work well. My 2 yr old can sit down happily color in her coloring book w/ these markers for a 20 minute stretch each time. Yes, these markers are indeed washable from my toddler's hands and from the table surface, but not as easy to remove the color red or black from her white long sleeve top. My 2 year old wore a smock, but since she pushed their smock sleeves up , the red and black wound up on their sleeves. Spot treating did not help, but I hope that after spraying with "Deft" (laundry spray for kids garments) and tossing int he wash, that the marker will come out of her top. Overall these markers are fantastic.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2025
reviews.title: Fun and good quality for a toddler and up

reviews.text: As a teacher, I’ve tried countless markers in my classroom, and these are by far the best! They last an incredibly long time without drying out—even when kids forget to put the caps back on. The colors are vibrant, and the marks are solid and consistent. They work well on a variety of surfaces, including fabric. On tables, they wipe off easily, and they wash out of clothes with no problem. They do take a bit of scrubbing to remove from skin but nothing too difficult. One thing to note is that they can take a little longer to dry on poster board and may smear if touched while wet. Overall, these markers provide excellent coverage and are ideal for classroom use!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
reviews.title: Highest quality
